item.title: UBS lifts Amazon price target ahead of e-commerce giantâ€™s earnings
item.description: The bank maintained its buy rating on the e-commerce giant and lifted its 12-month price target.

item.title: AI is driving huge productivity gains for large companies, while small companies get left behind
item.description: Artificial intelligence is widening the productivity gap between the large and small companies, furthering the 'K-shaped economy' phenomenon.

item.title: One chip stock and two health names to own for the long run, according to investor Hulick
item.description: Hulick joined CNBC's "Power Lunch" on Monday to give his bullish take on a handful of stocks.

item.title: Stocks from Carvana to Reddit are expected to have the wildest moves on earnings this week
item.description: Several companies reporting earnings results this week could see their stocks post double-digit gains or losses.

item.title: Where to put your cash to work before the Fed cuts rates again
item.description: With cash yields set to fall as the Federal Reserve lower interest rates, investors may want to consider putting some of that money to work elsewhere.
